backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor placeholder for backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to files, components, and test identifiers.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files for quick reference.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind and OKLCH variable definitions with dark theme styling and base layout rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point containing the root div and script loader for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Renders the LandingPage component as the main application view.
frontend/src/components/landing/effects/: Generates animated gradient and floating particle effects behind the hero section.
frontend/src/components/landing/LandingP: Composes all landing page sections with refs for scroll reveal animations and smooth scrolling.
frontend/src/components/landing/sections: Displays a grid of product features with icons and descriptive text.
Final call‑to‑action section with headline, description, and glow‑accented CTA button.
Footer with copyright, attribution link, and social media icons.
Hero banner with animated background, headline, subheadline, and CTA buttons.
Three‑step explanation of how the product works using icon cards.
Re-exports all landing page section components for simplified imports.
Renders a pricing section with three tier configurations and maps them into PricingCard components.
Displays a section highlighting common barriers to launching products using styled cards and icons.
frontend/src/components/landing/ui/Divid: Provides a simple horizontal glowing divider element.
frontend/src/components/landing/ui/Featu: Maps a list of feature objects into a responsive grid of GlassCard items with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/landing/ui/Glass: A reusable glass-style card component with optional hover glow behavior.
frontend/src/components/landing/ui/GlowB: Extends a Button with glow effects and styling variants using forwardRef.
frontend/src/components/landing/ui/IconB: Displays an icon inside a glowing glass-style badge container.
frontend/src/components/landing/ui/Prici: Renders an individual pricing tier card with features, pricing, and a call-to-action button.
frontend/src/components/landing/ui/Secti: Wraps children in a styled container section with layout utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements context and logic for managing Internet Identity authentication and state.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollReveal.ts: Adds scroll-reveal animation behavior to referenced DOM elements via IntersectionObserver.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, custom theme variables, glass effects, glow utilities, and animations.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides a utility function to merge and normalize class names.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, radii, shadows, fonts, and animation keyframes, plus plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: JSON metadata describing the project’s state, goals, design requirements, and feature list for building the IDEAZS landing page.
